name: Autojunk.nl Dark
description: Light-weight dark theme for autojunk.nl, including some ads-suppression. For the best (consistent across the websites) experience please combine with the 'Autoblog.nl Dark' theme.
additional_info: v1.11 - 2018-12-20 • Updated Ad-Blocking styles v1.10 - 2018-11-31 • Themed topbar-menu like autoblog.nl for more consistent look & feel • Themed background-colors like autoblog.nl for more consistent look & feel • Darkened grid-borders • Darkened all the buttons • Increased color fidelity for cloud-tag and footer links • Suppressed unresponsive hover-transition effects
